thread.title: Why Lithium and Cobalt Producers Are the Hot New Acquisition Target

author: Amrith Ramkumar
title: Why Lithium and Cobalt Producers Are the Hot New Acquisition Target

organizations.name: cobalt producers are the hot new acquisition target tesla inc.

text:
Tesla Inc. and a large Chinese firm each struck new deals with lithium producers on Thursday, the latest sign that technology companies, car makers and other big users of lithium are rushing to secure supplies of the material used in electric car and cell phone batteries.
Both lithium and cobalt, which is also used in these batteries, face potential shortages in the years ahead as electric-vehicle use grows.
